title: lost my acc and forgot my email that i putted on what to do :_:
body: i sudenly coulnt log in to my acc --and i cant remember what email i putted on and now i cant enter :_:

replies.body: I've edited out the username in your post for security reasons.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will be happy to look into this for you.  After some questions to confirm ownership, they'll be able to help with recovery and updating info.  We'll get back to you!

TY u so much

well for instance u can see that i have plaeyd many games with ha1kuu

Hey Porocles {{summoner:31}} , can you look at my post quick, I sent it 2 recovery tickets on the same day and the 2nd ticketed flagged it as my 4th recovery, the 2 tickets I sent on the same day were not for separate cases.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/8gKZHAPE-riot-support-please-read-this

Thank you and have a wonderful day!
